column4: Quick question (hopefully), im trying to get my soundcard to work, when i type lsmod snd-ens1371 shows up alongside snd (among others) and modprobe snd-ens1371 shows no errors, however when i type aplay -l i get a message saying no soundcards found
a lot of forums mention using alsaconf but that apparently ha been removed in 7.10
check dmesg befor/after loading that module.. that may be the wrong one for your card..
no errors, it seems to be the right chipset when checking the name on the card and checking the alsa-device list
